QuestData.Title: Targets of Opportunity
QuestData.Description: We were part of a clandestine operation put together by Prince Nadun of Ramkahen. We lost most of our unit during an ambush and we're now unable to finish our mission.$B$BShould you be up for it, I can arrange for a sizable reward for you.$B$BWe were instructed to take out any targets of opportunity that would damage the enemy's military infrastructure.$B$BWe've spotted General Husam and two of his captains up ahead. Slaying them for us will be a great favor for Ramkahen.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: We must deliver a fatal blow to the Neferset command structure!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay General Husam and 2 Oathsworn Captains.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $N. Your reputation is well-deserved.
